item.title: 298: I'm Still Wicked, Conclave Boys
item.description:
We continue our yearly tradition of breaking down the Best Picture nominees and the odds they have to win each of their categories. On this final episode of the series we talk aboutWicked,Conclave,I'm Still Here andNickel Boys. We label each nomination as Frontrunner, Dark Horse, Longshot and Just Happy To Be There. Joining the show is Paulo Bautista host of theOscars Death Race Podcast.

Check out our⁠Oscar Primer blog entries⁠ where we look at other films nominated at the Oscars... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/9810c8c/podcast/rss

item.title: Allison Rank et al., "Civic Pedagogies: Teaching Civic Engagement in an Era of Divisive Politics" (Palgrave Macmillan, 2024)
item.description: An interview with Allison Rank, Carah Ong Whaley, and Lauren C. Bell Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/LIT4894369277
